title: SoA1:K
text: Demonstrate the ability to empathize with and show gratitude for others, including those with different and diverse perspectives, abilities, backgrounds, and cultures. (Collaboration)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can recognize the feelings and strengths of others.
I can identify and value similarities and differences in abilities, cultures, traditions and beliefs.
I can explain why I am grateful for someone or something in my life.

title: SoA2:K
text: Demonstrate the ability to understand broader historical and social contextsâ€™ impact on humanity. (Citizenship) RELATIONSHIP SKILLS
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can explain why something is fair or unfair.
